description: Get information about an import task and count of device onboarding summary information for the import task.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the import task for which information is requested.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the import task for which information is retrieved.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the import task.

nested_items.name: DestinationName
nested_items.description: The name of the destination that's assigned to the wireless devices in the import task.

nested_items.name: DeviceCreationFileList
nested_items.description: List of Sidewalk devices that are added to the import task.

nested_items.name: Role
nested_items.description: The IAM role that allows AWS IoT Wireless to access the CSV file in the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the import task was created.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the provided status information, such as a validation error that causes the import task to fail.

nested_items.name: InitializedImportedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices in the import task that are waiting for the control log to start processing.

nested_items.name: PendingImportedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices in the import task that are waiting in the import task queue to be onboarded.

nested_items.name: OnboardedImportedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices in the import task that have been onboarded to the import task.

nested_items.name: FailedImportedDeviceCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices in the import task that failed to onboard to the import task.
